high_elves.name: High Elf Worlds
high_elves.description: The High Elf Worlds are a group of large constructed fleet habitats. They focus on a mobile and deadly mix of advanced technology and unique fast tactics to achieve victory

dark_elves.name: Dark Elf Raiders
dark_elves.description: The Dark Elf Raiders are a group of elves who have an obsession with raiding settlements for plunder. Their tactics revolve around attacking quickly with highly agile ships and doing damage after which they quickly escape.

alien_swarm.name: Alien Swarm
alien_swarm.description: A swarm of aliens from far-away systems controlled by an ancient hive mind. They feast on other species, absorbing their biomass to turn into more of their kind. They have a combination of deadly creatures and swarms of agile aliens to defeat their foes.

alien_cults.name: Alien Cults
alien_cults.description: The Alien Cults are a loose band of alien worshippers who have been infiltrated by an Alien Swarm. They form on unsuspecting planets and eventually grow strong enough to take control. Alien Cults use a mix of hybrid alien creatures and scavenged weapons along with guerilla tactics.

corrupted_marines.name: Corrupted Marines
corrupted_marines.description: The corrupted marines are a band of marines that betrayed the Human Empire and now cooperate with demons and other heretics to pursue their own desires. They have a mix of deadly beasts, dangerous war machines and tough marine infantry.

corrupted_defense_force.description: The corrupted defense force are a band of deserters and other folks out for their own interests. They have gathered much of what they can from the Imperial Defense Force and now fight with the traitors against those that stay loyal.

undying_machines.description: The Undying Machines are a race of once-people now cursed with unending machine immortality. They rely on waves of reanimating fighters and advanced ancient technology to win their battles.

elven_keepers.description: The Elven Keepers are a race of elves who are tasked with keeping the grand elf library. They have a unique close combat and fast oriented style with deadly weaponry and quick jetbike and hovercraft vehicles.

free_colonies.description: The Free Colonies are an alliance of several alien worlds cooperating together in the name of survival and prosperity. They rely on a mix of advanced battle warsuits and deadly pulse weaponry to defeat their enemies.

mutant_tribes.description: A strange alien race that joined the Federation to test their self-modifying biotech.  These lightly-armoured warriors attack with a variety of strange beasts and adaptations that can change from turn to turn.

ascended_astroraptors.description: Uplifted millenia ago by an unknown precursor race, the Ascended Astro-Raptors advanced from feral beasts to exploring the stars. They combine advanced technology with deadly close-ranged and claw-filled assaults.

knight_lords.name: Knight Lords
knight_lords.description: The Knight Lords are a loose organization of many different knight guilds which build and maintain unique and gigantic war machines. The Knight Lords rely on huge Knight war machines and good old fashioned chivalry to pound their foes.

faith_wardens.name: Faith Wardens
faith_wardens.description: The Faith Wardens are a sect of the Human Empire which have a uniquely faithful and religious background. The Faith Wardens rely on prayer and faith in their holy symbols along with some good old fashioned holy fire to defeat their enemies.

machine_guilds.description: The Machine Guilds are a unique group of several different but organized planets which create and maintain all sort sof wild war machines and contraptions. The Machine Guilds rely on technological augmentation and deadly weapons to destroy their enemies.

imperial_defense_force.name: Imperial Defence Force
imperial_defense_force.description: The Imperial Defense Force is the backbone defense force of the many civilian planets of the empire. They are the first to respond to any miliary threats. They rely on hardy battle tanks and good old artillery shells along with waves of human fighters to defend the Empire.

imperial_marines.name: Imperial Marines
imperial_marines.description: The Imperial Marines are the pride of the Human Empire and its elite order-keeping force should they need to be deployed. The Imperial Marines rely on tough infantry and somewhat advanced vehicle technology to outsmart and eliminate their enemies.

throne_guardians.name: Throne Guardians
throne_guardians.description: The Throne Guardians are the defenders of the Human Empire's capital. Only the most elite Imperial Marines are recruited to be Throne Guardians and with that they are the most well-trained. The Throne Guardians rely on the most elite and well-trained infantry along with powerful and ancient war weaponry to defend their home planet.

orc_clans.description: The Orc Clans are a mostly disconnected species of clans who are constantly at war with others and each other. The Orc Clans rely on massive all-out assaults and cobbled-together technology and vehicles to outlast and overwhelm their foes.

goblin_hordes.description: Once part of the Orc Clans, these goblins have left to form their own independent and respected clans. Usually Goblins will not fight on their own, but when they do they bring absurd machinery and great numbers to the fight.

imperial_inquisition.description: The Imperial Inquisition is the order dedicated to hunting dangerous demons and other Psychic entities which cannot be trusted in the Human Empire. Their tactics rely on using skilled demon hunting individuals along with advanced assassins to hunt and destroy those who most dangerous.

mobility_focus.description: A focus on fast and fluid movement.

tactical_focus.name: Tactical
tactical_focus.description: A focus on outsmarting and tricking the enemy.

stealth_focus.name: Stealth
stealth_focus.description: A focus on sneaky and silent tactics.

vigilance_focus.name: Vigilance
vigilance_focus.description: A focus on alertness and reactivity.

power_focus.name: Power
power_focus.description: A focus on casting stronger and more consistent powers.

toughness_focus.name: Toughness
toughness_focus.description: A focus on survival and unrelenting.

shock_focus.name: Shock
shock_focus.description: A focus on striking fear into your enemies.

siege_focus.name: Siege
siege_focus.description: A focus on siege warfare and denying cover.

morale_focus.name: Morale
morale_focus.description: A focus on morale and battle awareness.

forge_masters.name: Forge Masters
forge_masters.description: The Forge Masters are a mining race of dwarven ancestry. They roam the endless expanse in large fleets searching for exquisite loot and are not opposed to doing a job or two for anyone with the money to pay. They favor heavy armor and deadly close ranged weaponry.

assault_focus.name: Assault
assault_focus.description: A focus on all-out assaults and aggression.

mechanized_focus.name: Mechanized
mechanized_focus.description: A focus on transports and vehicle combat.

mobility_focus.name: Mobility
mobility_focus.description: A focus on fast and fluid movement.

tactical_focus.name: Tactical
tactical_focus.description: A focus on outsmarting and tricking the enemy.

stealth_focus.name: Stealth
stealth_focus.description: A focus on sneaky and silent tactics.

vigilance_focus.name: Vigilance
vigilance_focus.description: A focus on alertness and reactivity.

power_focus.name: Power
power_focus.description: A focus on casting stronger and more consistent powers.

toughness_focus.name: Toughness
toughness_focus.description: A focus on survival and unrelenting.

shock_focus.name: Shock
shock_focus.description: A focus on striking fear into your enemies.

siege_focus.name: Siege
siege_focus.description: A focus on siege warfare and denying cover.

morale_focus.name: Morale
morale_focus.description: A focus on morale and battle awareness.

gca.name: Galactic Corperate Allegiance
gca.description: The Galactic Corperate Allegiance is a brittle union of opportunistic arms dealers, cutthroat trading companies and private armies vying for control over lost sectors and profitable regions. They are equipped with the best tech and weapons money can buy and prefer stealth and crafty tactics.

assault_focus.name: Assault
assault_focus.description: A focus on all-out assaults and aggression.

mechanized_focus.name: Mechanized
mechanized_focus.description: A focus on transports and vehicle combat.

mobility_focus.name: Mobility
mobility_focus.description: A focus on fast and fluid movement.

tactical_focus.name: Tactical
tactical_focus.description: A focus on outsmarting and tricking the enemy.

stealth_focus.name: Stealth
stealth_focus.description: A focus on sneaky and silent tactics.

vigilance_focus.name: Vigilance
vigilance_focus.description: A focus on alertness and reactivity.

power_focus.name: Power
power_focus.description: A focus on casting stronger and more consistent powers.

toughness_focus.name: Toughness
toughness_focus.description: A focus on survival and unrelenting.

shock_focus.name: Shock
shock_focus.description: A focus on striking fear into your enemies.

siege_focus.name: Siege
siege_focus.description: A focus on siege warfare and denying cover.

morale_focus.name: Morale
morale_focus.description: A focus on morale and battle awareness.

skirmish.name: Generalist
skirmish.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any mission.

strike.name: Strike
strike.description: A strike force for outflanking or shock assaulting.

specialist.name: Specialist
specialist.description: An elite force to deal with specific targets.

heavy.name: Heavy
heavy.description: A heavy force to pack a punch on the field.

inspired.name: Inspired
inspired.flavor: This model inspires the best in those who serve them.

expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
expert_fighter.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Expert Fighter.
expert_fighter.flavor: This model has fought in many close quarters fights and survived.

quick_reflexes.name: Quick Reflexes
quick_reflexes.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Quick Reflexes.
quick_reflexes.flavor: This model has expert awareness and can react quickly.

arcane_awakening.name: Arcane Awakening
arcane_awakening.flavor: The dormant powers within this leader have awakened.

power_surge.name: Power Surge
power_surge.flavor: A boost of magic helps with casting powers.
power_surge.description: Upgrade one _Power_ model with Power Surge.

tome _of_power.name: Tome of Power
tome _of_power.flavor: A powerful artifact containing arcane knowledge.
tome _of_power.description: Upgrade one _Power_ model with Tome of Power.

battle_frenzy.name: Battle Frenzy
battle_frenzy.flavor: This leader can incite a potent bloodlust in their allies.
battle_frenzy.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Battle Frenzy.

final_stand.name: Final Stand
final_stand.flavor: Prepared to fight to the end, this leader will fight on beyond death.
final_stand.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Final Stand.

reaping_blade.name: The Reaping Blade
reaping_blade.flavor: This weapon emits an aura of unbridled rage, granting its wielder superhuman strength.
reaping_blade.description: Replace one _Leader_ model's Melee weapon with Reaping Blade(X).

momentum.name: Momentum
momentum.flavor: This leader knows how to use their speed to its greatest advantage.

swiftness.name: Swiftness
swiftness.flavor: This unit has been blessed with great swiftness.
swiftness.description: Upgrade one _Biker_, _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ unit with Swiftness.

pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
pathfinder.flavor: This leader knows and teaches how to read tracks and where to move for maximum efficency.

surprise_attack.name: Surprise Attack
surprise_attack.flavor: Once the trap has been sprung the enemy is stuck in a deadly assault.
surprise_attack.description: Upgrade one _Infantry_, _Heavy Infantry_ or _Biker_ unit with Surprise Attack.

poison_mastery.name: Poison Mastery
poison_mastery.flavor: This leader coated their weapons with a lethal poison.
poison_mastery.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model's Melee weapons with Poison.

headhunter.name: The Headhunter
headhunter.flavor: This legendary weapon has ended many wars before they even started.
headhunter.description: Replace one _Leader_ model's Ranged weapon with Headhunter(X).

preacher.name: Preacher
preacher.flavor: A prayer in dark times can lift spirits to achieve impossible deeds.
preacher.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Battle Prayer.

heroism.name: Heroism
heroism.flavor: These fighters easily shakes off the horrors of war.

banner_of_legend.name: Banner of Legend
banner_of_legend.flavor: This enchanted banner inspires nearby allies.
banner_of_legend.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with the Banner of Legend.

brilliant_strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
brilliant_strategist.flavor: A mastermind of war, able to guide fellow soldiers to victory.
brilliant_strategist.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Brilliant Strategist.

commanding_presence.name: Commanding Presence
commanding_presence.flavor: This leader has natural charisma and leadership, enhancing their orders.
commanding_presence.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Commanding Presence.

cqc.name: Close Combat Fighters
cqc.flavor: These fighters are trained to fight close up with the enemy.
cqc.description: Upgrade an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit with Close Combat Fighters.

eagle_eyed.name: Eagle-Eyed
eagle_eyed.flavor: These fighters are trained to hold objectives and strike down any enemy that tries to take it from them.
eagle_eyed.description: Upgrade one _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit with Eagle-Eyed.

watchmaster.name: Watchmaster
watchmaster.flavor: This leader emits an aura of intent that grants their allies increased reflexes.

swift.name: Swift
swift.flavor: This leader can easily dodge attacks after they analyzed the enemy's movements.

bulwark.name: Bulwark
bulwark.flavor: This leader increases the defense of nearby allies.

defensive_mastery.name: Defensive Mastery
defensive_mastery.flavor: This leader shrugs of deadly strikes with well-timed blocks.
defensive_mastery.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Defensive Mastery.

unnatural_vitality.name: Unnatural Vitality
unnatural_vitality.flavor: Blessed with superhuman vitality, this fighter can endure countless injuries.

relentless.name: Relentless
relentless.flavor: These fighters don't stop until the enemy positions are reduced to rubble.
relentless.description: Upgrade one _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit with Relentless.

siege_master.name: Siege Master
siege_master.flavor: This leader is legendary for their ability to annihilate enemy warmachines.
siege_master.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ model with Siege Master.

siegebreaker.name: Siegebreaker
siegebreaker.flavor: When this legendary hammer strikes true the enemy is reduced to nothing but dust.
siegebreaker.description: Replace one _Leader_ model's Melee weapon with Siegebreaker(X).

stabilizers.name: Stabilizers
stabilizers.flavor: Stabilizers allow for heavy fire on the move.
stabilizers.description: Upgrade one _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ model with Stabilizers.

repair_drones.name: Repair Drones
repair_drones.flavor: This titan of war employs supportive drones that fix any damage suffered.
repair_drones.description: Upgrade one _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ model with Regeneration.

devastation_battery.name: Devastation Battery
devastation_battery.flavor: Enhanced with missile batteries, this war machine can unleash devastating attacks.
devastation_battery.description: Upgrade one _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ model with Devastation Battery.

expert_gunner.name: Expert Gunner
expert_gunner.flavor: This model has fought in many long range battles and survived.
expert_gunner.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ unit with Expert Gunner.

crack_shot.name: Crack Shot
crack_shot.flavor: This leader is an expert sharpshooter or just lucky.
crack_shot.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ unit with Crack Shot.

grenadier.name: Grenadier
grenadier.flavor: These fighters are experts at using grenades and other explosives.

brutal_display.name: Brutal Display
brutal_display.flavor: This leader fights with such a frenzy that enemies flee in terror.
brutal_display.description: Upgrade one _Leader_'s Melee weapon with Shocking(3).

master_hunter.name: Master Hunter
master_hunter.flavor: This leader has perfected the art of hunting down their weakened prey.
master_hunter.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ unit with Master Hunter.

grizly_trophies.name: Grizly Trophies
grizly_trophies.flavor: These fighters collects trophies of war and display them to terrorize the enemy.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(0). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

flaming_sword.name: Flaming Sword
flaming_sword.description: A friendly unit within 6" gains +1 AP with one Melee weapon until the end of the turn.

searing_bolt.name: Searing Bolt
searing_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(7). On a casting roll of 1 or 2, they take 2 hits instead.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: Target enemy model within 24" and all models within 3" of it take 1 hit with AP(0).

fog_bank.name: Fog Bank
fog_bank.description: Place a 3" diameter smoke marker within 12. Smoke markers block line of sight and models inside or partially obscured by smoke markers gain the benefit of Soft Cover. At the end of the round, roll a D10. On a 5 or less the smoke marker is removed.

crushing_waves.name: Crushing Waves
crushing_waves.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 2 hits with AP(4).

earthen_armor.name: Earthen Armor
earthen_armor.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gains +1 Save until the end of the turn.

crystal_volley.name: Crystal Volley
crystal_volley.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(1).

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

violent_gale.name: Violent Gale
violent_gale.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP(0) and is pushed 1" away from this model.

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately make a free _Move_ action.

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(8).

frost_lance.name: Frost Lance
frost_lance.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(4) and has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

whiteout.name: Whiteout
whiteout.description: Target friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

murder_of_crows.name: Murder of Crows
murder_of_crows.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(0) and has -1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

entangling_roots.name: Entangling Roots
entangling_roots.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hit with AP(1) and has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

wild_frenzy.name: Wild Frenzy
wild_frenzy.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may make one additional attack with one Melee weapon until the end of the turn.

silver_bolt.name: Silver Bolt
silver_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(5). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

molten_rain.name: Molten Rain
molten_rain.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 6 automatic hits with AP(2).

rust.name: Rust
rust.description: Target enemy unit within 12" has -1 Save until end of turn.

cloak_of_shadows.name: Cloak of Shadows
cloak_of_shadows.description: Target a friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the turn models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this unit.

soul_dagger.name: Soul Dagger
soul_dagger.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(3). This power can target units not within of Line of Sight.

fright.name: Fright
fright.description: Target enemy unit within 12" gains 2 Shock.

blinding_shield.name: Blinding Shield
blinding_shield.description: Target a friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the turn models suffer -1 Strength when targeting this unit with a melee attack.

smite.name: Smite
smite.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 2 hits with AP(3).

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.description: Target friendly unit within 12" has +1 Courage until the end of the turn.

drain_life.name: Drain Life
drain_life.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP(3). If any model is slain restore 1 wound to this model.

spectral_grasp.name: Spectral Grasp
spectral_grasp.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 3 hits with AP(0) and is moved 1" towards this model.

doom.name: Doom
doom.description: Target enemy unit within 12" has -1 Courage until the end of the turn.

unnerving_accuracy.name: Unnerving Accuracy
unnerving_accuracy.description: Target friendly unit within 18" may make one additional attack with any Ranged weapon until the end of the turn.

incinerating_beam.name: Incinerating Beam
incinerating_beam.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hits with AP(8).

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.description: Roll a d10 for each enemy unit within 6". On a roll of 5 or lower the unit hit takes 2 hits with AP(4).

rejuvenation_beam.name: Rejuvenation Beam
rejuvenation_beam.description: Target friendly _Infantry_ unit within 12" rolls 1D10 for each missing model in the unit. On a 3 or less that model is restored. This power may only be cast once per turn.

detect_weakness.name: Detect Weakness
detect_weakness.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must re-roll one succesful die on its next Save test. This power may be cast unlimited times.

heightened_senses.name: Heightened Senses
heightened_senses.description: Target friendly unit within 12" has +1 Initiative until the of the turn.

energy_bolt.name: Energy Bolt
energy_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(4). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

mage_sight.name: Mage Sight
mage_sight.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may target units with _Shoot_ and _Power_ actions that are out of line of sight until the end of the turn.

arcane_barrage.name: Arcane Barrage
arcane_barrage.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 8 hits with AP(1).

assault_ram_grenade.name: Assault Ram with Underslung Grenade Launcher

legend_expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
legend_expert_fighter.description: This model may make one additional attack with any Melee weapon.

wings.name: Wings
wings.description: This model may ignore models and terrain when moving.

scrambler.name: Scrambler
scrambler.description: Enemy units arriving from reserves within 18" of this model suffer -2 Initiative on reserve tests.

assault_ramp.name: Assault Ramp
assault_ramp.description: Units may disembark from this model even after it has taken two _Move_ actions.

banner_of_wrath.name: Banner of Wrath
banner_of_wrath.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" may gain +1 AP on all Melee weapons.

banner_of_focus.name: Banner of Focus
banner_of_focus.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" may gain +1 AP on all Shooting weapons.

dozer.name: Dozer
dozer.description: This model may cross low obstacles without penalty.

psych_out.name: Dangerous(Psychic)
psych_out.description: This weapon has +1 AP against units with the Psychic special rule.

dark_prism.name: Dark Prism
dark_prism.description: Once per round, when a model with Power(x) casts a power within 24", roll a D10. If the die roll is lower than or equal to the casting roll, the power is prevented.

mutations.name: Mutations
mutations.description:
At the beginning of the game choose one of the following effects to be applied to this unit: 
 * Strength rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP 
 * Strength rolls of 1 or 2 cause 2 hits instead of 1. 
 * +1 Save

disk_of_change.name: Disk of Change
disk_of_change.description: This model increases its Movement by 2". This unit may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

stormtrooper_tactics.name: Storm Trooper Tactics
stormtrooper_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Storm Trooper_ _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ 
 * +3" of Movement

psychic_prowess.name: Prowess
psychic_prowess.description: All Power charge values are increased by X for this model. For example a power requiring a 6 or less now requires 6+X or less.

hover_mode.name: Hover Mode
hover_mode.description: When this Aircraft is activated, it may choose to fly in Hover mode. If it does, units do not suffer -1 Accuracy when targeting this unit, but it is not required to make a _Move_ action when activated.

marking_flares.name: Marking Flares
marking_flares.description: Once per round, a friendly _Biker_ unit may gain +4" of Movement.

surveying_device.name: Surveying Device
surveying_device.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 12" may ignore the benefit of cover while shooting.

spotting_device.name: Spotting Device
spotting_device.description: Increase the short and long range of all ranged weapons equipped by this unit by 6".

titan_shield.name: Titan Shield
titan_shield.description: This unit subtracts 1 from all Damage Chart rolls.

no_retreat.name: No Retreat
no_retreat.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 3" may automatically pass a Break test.

amplification.name: Psionic Amplification
amplification.description: When making power tests within 6" of this model, you may roll two dice and discard one.

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.description: Models gain +1 Courage when taking Courage Tests within 6" of this model.

intensity.name: Intensity
intensity.description: This weapon has +X AP at long range.

medic_biker.name: Medic
medic_biker.description: Whenever a friendly _Infantry_ or _Biker_ unit within 6" loses a model or Wound(x), roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that loss is prevented.

spotting_laser.name: Spotting Laser
spotting_laser.description:
Any time during this model's activation, pick an enemy unit within 36" to gain 1 spotting marker. When a friendly unit shoots at that target they may spend spotting markers to gain the following for that attack: 
 * One Marker: Re-roll Accuracy rolls of 9+ 
 * Two Markers: +1 Accuracy 


 These effects are cumulative and may be activated multiple times. At the end of the round, remove all spotting markers.

beast_tactics.name: Beast Tactics
beast_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Beast_ or _Monster_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

legend_strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
legend_strategist.description: While this model is on the field the first Strategy you use each turn cost 1 SP less.

legend_power_surge.name: Power Surge
legend_power_surge.description: Once per turn this model may re-roll a Power roll of 9+.

legend_tome.name: Tome of Power
legend_tome.description: This model knows an additional Power Specialty to cast Powers from.

legend_battle_frenzy.name: Battle Frenzy
legend_battle_frenzy.description: Once per turn a friendly unit within 6" of this model may re-roll all failed Strength tests of 9+ when attacking.

legend_final_stand.name: Final Stand
legend_final_stand.description: When this model would be killed and it didn't activate this turn yet, it may take a free _Fight_ or _Shoot_ action before it is removed from the game.

legend_swiftness.name: Swiftness
legend_swiftness.description: This unit increases its Movement characteristic by 2".

legend_pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
legend_pathfinder.description: When this unit and up to two other units within 6 are deployed or arrive from Reserves, they may make a free Move action. This action may not move within 12" of any enemy units.

legend_surprise_attack.name: Surprise Attack
legend_surprise_attack.description: When this unit arrives from Reserves, it may make a free _Charge_ or _Shoot_ action.

legend_heroism.name: Heroism
legend_heroism.description: Once per round, this unit may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

legend_cqc.name: Close Combat Fighters
legend_cqc.description: This unit adds +3" to short range when shooting.

legend_presence.name: Commanding Presence
legend_presence.description: This model adds +3" to the range of their _Leader_ and _Tactician_ special rules.

legend_bulwark.name: Bulwark
legend_bulwark.description: Friendly units within 6" may re-roll a single failed Save test once per turn.

legend_defensive_mastery.name: Defensive Mastery
legend_defensive_mastery.description: This model may re-roll failed Save tests of 9+.

legend_watchmaster.name: Watchmaster
legend_watchmaster.description: Friendly units within 6" may re-roll Initiative tests of 9+.

legend_eagle_eyed.name: Eagle-Eyed
legend_eagle_eyed.description: This unit may re-roll failed Accuracy tests when attacking whilst controlling an Objective.

legend_siege_master.name: Siege Master
legend_siege_master.description: This unit may re-roll failed Strength and Accuracy tests when attacking a unit with the _Damage Chart_ special rule.

legend_expert_gunner.name: Expert Gunner
legend_expert_gunner.description: This model may make one additional attack with any Ranged weapon.

legend_grenadier.name: Grenadier
legend_grenadier.description: Weapons with the _Grenade_ special rule used by this unit hit with +1 Accuracy.

legend_stabilizers.name: Stabilizers
legend_stabilizers.description: This model may make a free shoot action at any time during their move at -1 Accuracy. They may not shoot again this round.

legend_eagle_eyed_0.name: Eagle-Eyed
legend_eagle_eyed_0.description: This unit may re-roll failed Accuracy tests when attacking whilst controlling an Objective.

legend_master_hunter.name: Master Hunter
legend_master_hunter.description: This model gains +2" of Movement when taking a Charge action.

overwhelming_strength.name: Overwhelming Strength
overwhelming_strength.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ unit takes a _Fight_ or _Shoot_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
overwhelming_strength.flavor: Using their greater size and momentum to their advantage, titans of war can crush even the toughest resistance.

durability.name: Durability
durability.description: Use when activating a _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ unit. It may ignore any critical injuries it has sustained for this activation.
durability.flavor: Well-maintained vehicles and machinery can operate even under great stress.

indestructible.name: Indestructible
indestructible.description: Use after a _Vehicle_ or _Monster_ unit takes Save rolls. Roll a die for each unsaved hit this unit takes. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
indestructible.flavor: Expertly built and well-maintained, this titan of war can withstand devastating barrages.

bolster.name: Bolster
bolster.description: Use after an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit takes Save rolls. Roll a die for each unsaved hit this unit takes. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
bolster.flavor: These warriors are able to withstand enemy fire through sheer force of will.

mastercrafted_armor.name: Mastercrafted Armor
mastercrafted_armor.description: Use when an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit takes Save rolls. That unit may re-roll failed Save rolls of 9+.
mastercrafted_armor.flavor: Enemy fire just shrugs off of these warriors as they march forward.

unrelenting_move.name: Unrelenting Move
unrelenting_move.description: Use when a unit takes a _Move_action. That unit ignores the effect of _Difficult Ground_ terrain for that move.
unrelenting_move.flavor: These warriors push forward even through the mud and blood of the battlefield.

hunker_down.name: Hunker down
hunker_down.description: Use when an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit takes Save rolls. If the unit did not move this round or benefits from cover, it gains +1 Save for this attack.
hunker_down.flavor: A strong defensive position ensures greater survival, even against the toughest of weapons.

devastation.name: Devastation
devastation.description: Use when a unit takes a _Shoot_ action. The enemy unit does not gain the benefit of cover.
devastation.flavor: Finding and exploiting a vulnerable piece of cover can lead to devastating results.

suppression.name: Suppression
suppression.description: Use when a unit takes a _Shoot_ action. If the attack hits, assign 2 additional Shock.
suppression.flavor: Enemy units cannot hope to stand a chance against constant fire and bombardments.

clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
clairvoyance.description: Use when a unit takes a _Shoot_ action. That unit may target units out of line of sight.
clairvoyance.flavor: Visions can be used to guide one's aim to strike enemies before they even come into line of sight.

channeling.name: Channeling
channeling.description: Use before a unit with the _Power_ special rule takes a Power test. The Power's cast value is increased by 1 and the Power has +6" range.
channeling.flavor: With focus and energy, even the most difficult powers can be manifested.

dispel.name: Dispel
dispel.description: Use when a Power test is being taken within 24 of an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry unit. Roll a D10 and if the value is equal to or lower than the rolled value for the test, the power is stopped. If the power is not stopped, no further attempts may be made to stop the same power.
dispel.flavor: With vigilant training, one can protect themselves from malign powers.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.
ambush.flavor: Laying in wait, these warriors spring to action when the time is right.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: Use when a unit is being targeted by a Shooting attack. The enemy unit has -1 Accuracy for that attack.
evasion.flavor: These warriors are trained in stealth tactics allowing them to hide even in plain sight.

stealth_move.name: Stealth Move
stealth_move.description: Use before a unit takes a _Move_ action. Enemy units may not take reactions to that _Move_ action.
stealth_move.flavor: Moving quietly or using cloaking technology is sometimes key in advancing on the enemy.

moving_fire.name: Moving Fire
moving_fire.description: Use after a unit takes a _Move_ action. That unit may make a free _Shoot_ action with -1 Accuracy. Any weapons with the _Assault_ special rule ignore the -1 Accuracy penalty.
moving_fire.flavor: These fighters are trained to shoot on the move to maintain pressure on their enemies.

overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
overwhelm.description: Use when a unit takes a _Fight_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
overwhelm.flavor: With a flurry of attacks even the greatest enemy will eventually falter and fall.

furious_charge.name: Furious Charge
furious_charge.description: Use when a unit takes a _Charge_ action. That unit gains +3" of Movement for that move.
furious_charge.flavor: Eager to fight, these fighters use their unnatural speed to engage the enemy.

outflank.name: Outflank
outflank.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Outflanking reserves_ before the game begins.
outflank.flavor: Using precise coordination, these fighters arrive on the battlefield encircling the enemy and cutting off valuable escape routes.

tactical_retreat.name: Tactical Retreat
tactical_retreat.description: Use when an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit attempts to fall back from melee. That unit automatically passes the Initiative test required to fall back.
tactical_retreat.flavor: A tactical retreat can cause an enemy a lot of problems as their plans are foiled.

re_deploy.name: Re-Deploy
re_deploy.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each is split into two equal size units, deployed and activated seperately. A unit formed this way cannot have less models than its minimum size.
re_deploy.flavor: Splitting up and approaching the battlefield over multiple flanks can be more effective.

vigilance.name: Vigilance
vigilance.description: Use when taking an Initiative test for a reaction. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
vigilance.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these troops are trained to react to any situation.

overwatch.name: Overwatch
overwatch.description: Use after an _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit takes a _Move_ action. That unit takes a free _Hold_ action.
overwatch.flavor: Cautious movement and a keen eye is the key to staying alive.

supercharge.name: Supercharge
supercharge.description: Use when a unit takes a _Shoot_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
supercharge.flavor: By supercharging their weapons, some hits can pierce even heavily armored targets.

quick_aim.name: Quick Aim
quick_aim.description: Use after a _Biker_ or _Vehicle_ unit takes a _Move_ action. That unit may make a free _Shoot_ action with -1 Accuracy. Any weapons with the _Assault_ special rule ignore the -1 Accuracy penalty.
quick_aim.flavor: These fighters are so used to firing from the hip while speeding their way upfield that their accuracy doesn't suffer.

run_them_down.name: Run Them Down
run_them_down.description: Use when a unit takes a _Charge_ action. The Impact Rule gains +1 AP for the charge.
run_them_down.flavor: Those clans with a focus on speed enjoy putting a little extra oomph on their vehicles, making them hit just a little harder when they ram into something.

push_it.name: Push It
push_it.description: Use when a unit takes a _Move_ action. It gains +3" move for that action
push_it.flavor: These orcs have either a special fuel or know little tricks to get them upfield just that little bit faster than their slower brethren.

terror.name: Terror
terror.description: Use when a unit within 6" of a friendly _Infantry_ or _Heavy Infantry_ unit takes a Courage test. That unit suffers -1 Courage until the end of its activation.
terror.flavor: These fighters invoke a sense of fear in their enemies which has not been seen before.

frozen_in_fear.name: Frozen in Fear
frozen_in_fear.description: Use before a unit takes a _Charge_ action. Enemy units may not perform reactions to that _Charge_ action.
frozen_in_fear.flavor: Letting out a terrible war cry can sometimes leave enemies unable to react to what is happening.

shock_tactics.name: Shock Tactics
shock_tactics.description: Use when a unit takes a _Fight_ action. If the attack hits, assign 2 additional Shock.
shock_tactics.flavor: With a sudden strike these fighters keep their enemies from retaliating.

take_aim.name: Take Aim
take_aim.description: Use when a unit takes a _Shoot_ action. That unit may re-roll failed Accuracy rolls of 9+.
take_aim.flavor: Carefully aiming at an enemy can compensate for impairing conditions.

overwhelming_firepower.name: Overwhelming Firepower
overwhelming_firepower.description: Use when a unit takes a _Shoot_ action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
overwhelming_firepower.flavor: Burst fire can be relatively effective in taking down most targets.

hp_ammo.name: High Power Ammunition
hp_ammo.description: Use when a unit takes a _Shoot_ action. Attacks made at Short range gain +1 AP.
hp_ammo.flavor: Using more powerful short range ammunition can stop the enemy dead in their tracks.

rallying_move.name: Rallying Move
rallying_move.description: Use before a unit takes a _Move_ action. That unit takes a free _Rally_ action.
rallying_move.flavor: Regrouping and recovering before moving out can help organize for a vital push onto an objective.

never_surrender.name: Never Surrender
never_surrender.description: Use before a unit takes a Courage test. That unit automatically passes the Courage test.
never_surrender.flavor: True bravery is standing and facing utter defeat with unbroken courage.

bravery.name: Bravery
bravery.description: Use when activating a unit. That unit gets +1 Courage until the end of its activation.
bravery.flavor: These fighters are particularly brave in the face of many horrors.

psychic_crystal.name: Psychic Amplification Crystal
psychic_crystal.description: A crystaline structure that amplifies psychic powers.

victory_symbol.name: Symbol of Victory
victory_symbol.description: Whether it's a hero's statue, a grand banner, or a Holo-Display of home, every sentient race has something to fight for.
